title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Further on is Crombie Point and Crombie House, then the village of Torryburn, next Torr}' House (J. Hay Wemyss, Esq., of "Wemyss Castle) and Newmills village.

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
